channel.title: Verification of Whonix.ova file
channel.description:
Hallo everyone,
OS: Windows 10
the reason I opened this support request is that the verification of whonix was just explained for whonix.EXE (Workstation and Gateway) but now all the files are put together into 1 file. Nowhere can I find an in depth verification step by step for the whonix.OVA file.
**1. The two things I already completed:** I downloaded all files how you can see (sorry it's in German): ![2019-05-17%2011_13_37-Whonix%20%26%20GPG|690x181,100%](upload://gtbjgY49CmPG5T9RLq3UwXwNYw7.png)
I verified the key of "Patrick Schleitzer" together with a key I created myself: ![image|690x157](upload://k90xFFx4LwIXt785TEOlEku4BEr.png) "beglaubigt" means "verified".
**2. How do I verify the .OVA file(s)?**
Now I'm totally overwhelmed. I am a complete cmd.exe and powershell newbie! Please explain everything to me like you would to a child.
The image below is made from the following link: https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Verify_the_virtual_machine_images_using_Windows ![image|690x237](upload://zMvWpAf3RI9l2s6XCt8EpHzpgkB.png) https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Whonix_Signing_Key#Download_the_Key I highlighted things with red I have not yet done. Which way do you recommend - Command lines or Kleopatra?
For the command line stuff I have the following link: https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Whonix_Signing_Key#Download_the_Key When I do this: ![image|311x59,100%](upload://EWzWuVeMvUqRTxyT5ht91agZGx.png) I get this: ![image|541x233](upload://o6vj7iB4KkSDdPFXZNppjitY1GQ.png) When I do this (**what do they mean with "~"?**): ![image|218x59](upload://nmHme08bZW5JRxDWosnwyGAejXX.png) I get this: ![image|460x64](upload://utEHrE2d2HUnm7Xm3wFTcfJIifD.png) It says: "command "chmod" either wrong or written the wrong way or couldn't be found" I get the same error return when I do this: ![image|367x50](upload://hUPWXf3dR03wf4oU7zZF61wDoIs.png)
There is another command line support page: https://www.whonix.org/wiki/VirtualBox/Verify_the_virtual_machine_images_using_the_command_line ![image|690x308](upload://o1H0S2nik97g4Xjw60Ig7veIID2.png) So when I do the first thing I get: ![image|690x74](upload://l9JFd5qHWNhSFs21pHlWVSmz9RW.png) It says: "syntax for this file name, index name or hard drive designation. Command "GPG" ist either spelled the wrong way or could not be found" Copying the whole whonix-stuff to hard drive C: did not make any difference. ![image|690x70](upload://bJT6GMDEQQiQzRKQ7yhqSBzTH0G.png)
This command line stuff is really getting to my nerves now. Could you please help me!
Best regards Robert

  • https://www.torproject.org/docs/verifying-signatures.html.en (scroll down to windows)

As @onion_knight mentioned, the commands you followed are for Linux.

item.title: Verification of Whonix.ova file
item.dc:creator: onion_knight
item.description:
Hi and welcome!

I don’t use Windows but it seems your command is wrong.

Did you try

cd D:\Whonix & GPG

instead of

cd [D:\Whonix & GPG]

?

regarding

chmod --recursive og-rwx ~/.gnupg

It is a UNIX command, I don’t think it works on Windows.
